attributes.action: STOP THE LONDON PICCADILLY CIRCUS MEGA MOSQUE BEING BUILT!
attributes.additional_details: Local people have strongly objected to the application on the basis that the area was already heavily overcrowded even before the coronavirus pandemic introduced the need for social distancing - and that adding another 1000 people, congregating in and around the mega-mosque during prayer times, would cause serious traffic disruption.
attributes.background: One of London's most iconic buildings, the Trocadero in Piccadilly, is due to be converted to a mega-mosque with capacity for 1000 worshippers following a recent application to Westminster City Council.

rejection.details:
This is matter for Westminster Council, not the Government or House of Commons.

If you are concerned about this proposal you should contact Westminster Council about this.
